english: I was very busy the whole day today

notes: -い adjective past tense\n待ち時間 means waiting time\nCan also use は particle, but が shows what exactly was long.

english: The company is close from the station
notes: -い adjective\nから means from - have not learned this yet

english: The company is close to the station
notes: -い adjective\nに can mean to - have not learned this yet

english: He runs fast (lit. his legs are fast)
